name: Space Combat (Shwetaketu/Theustweak)
description:
This is a an end to end project that I tried with UI, audio, vfx, post processing and the works. While I did know how to do it, I always worked on gameplay and uploaded the game without the necessary feel and feedback. 

However, the art style and the visual treatment isn't final. Keeping the gameplay more or less the same, I would attempt to work with my artist friends and give it a different art direction in near future.
